# wasRemoved

**Type Property**

A notification that Metal sends to observers when the system removes a GPU device.

## Declaration

```swift
static let wasRemoved: MTLDeviceNotificationName
```

## Discussion

This notification tells your app that an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance and its methods are no longer valid to avoid runtime failures.



## Creating a notification name

- **wasAdded**: A notification that Metal sends to observers when the system adds a GPU device.
- **removalRequested**: A notification that Metal sends to observers when a person requests to remove a GPU device from the system.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a Metal device notification name from a string.
